items.sentence: Tom came back home after being gone for many years.
Tom came into the lounge, carrying a cup of coffee.
Tom and Mary were speaking to each other in French.
I told Tom that I didn\'t know how to speak French.
Eating and drinking aren\'t allowed in the library.
I wanted to do something that would make Tom happy.
I wanted to tell you how much I enjoyed your party.
I was a pretty good clarinetist when I was younger.
I was afraid that something like this might happen.
Tom is very unpredictable when he\'s been drinking.
Tom plans to go out dancing with Mary, doesn\'t he?
Tom promised Mary that he\'d come home early today.
Tom promised Mary that he\'d meet her after school.
How come we\'re talking about me and not about you?
I really admire Tom\'s ability to answer questions.
I\'m proud of what you\'ve been able to accomplish.
Tom may forget to do that if you don\'t remind him.
Tom went to Boston. Everybody else went to Chicago.
Do you have any idea why Tom would want to do that?
I hope that Tom doesn\'t go to Australia with Mary.
